item.title: Upload and converting pictures automatically from Dropbox
item.description: I've been using Pelican to publish this website for awhile now, and one of the things I wanted to do was to be able to post from my phone and include pictures. To accomplish this I wrote a script that checks the upload folder in dropbox, and if there is …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins

item.title: Dropbox in the paperless classroom
item.description:
Dropbox Organization Tips for Teachers and the Paperless Classroom

Dropbox is an essential for me. I like apps that link with Dropbox in every way and it is an essential part of my paperless routine with my students. This past Sunday at #txeduchat I was asked some specific questions about …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins

item.title: Can Insync dethrone Dropbox as a cloud storage service?
item.description: A couple of weeks ago I read a Techcrunch article about Insync. It is a service that works almost identically to Dropbox. Their differentiating feature is the fact that they use your Google Docs account for storage. A downside to this is that you only have 1GB of storage with …
item.dc:creator: mr.rcollins
